title: I can't identify this font. Can you?
content:
Can anyone identify this font for me? Sorry for the poor image. It's the best the client had for me. Thank you for any help you can offer.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016222400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jb_5559.jpg)
author: Moman

comments.content: looks like [PlayBall](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016222400/http:/www.ffonts.net/Playball.font). the commercial version at [Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016222400/http:/www.fonts.com/font/typesetit/playball) does not seem to have the same uppercase.
